title: The Roots of tomorrow
creator_credit: Malayan Film Unit, United Nations. Office of Public Information, Franta G. Herman and A Peter Amavasi
brief_description: Emphasises the need for co-operation of Asian countries in economic development, showing work on the Asian Highway, the Mekong River Project and Regional Training Centres in India and Pakistan.
